entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who has passed away, and Harry feels he wasted opportunities when Dumbledore was alive. (Excerpt: 'should have asked Dumbledore...')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, who is reflecting on his past and feeling regretful about not asking Dumbledore more questions. (Excerpt: 'it seemed to Harry that he had wasted so many opportunities...')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends, who shrieks and drops a book when the bedroom door bursts open. (Excerpt: 'Hermione shrieked and dropped Secrets of the Darkest Art.')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another one of Harry's friends, who jumps off the bed and smacks his head on the wall. (Excerpt: 'Ron jumped oﬀ the bed...')

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is Hermione's cat, who streaks under the bed and hisses indignantly. (Excerpt: 'Crookshanks streaked under the bed...')

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is a family member of Harry's, who bursts into the room and scolds them for not helping with wedding presents. (Excerpt: 'Harry instinctively dived for his wand before realizing that he was looking up at Mrs. Weasley...')

entities.name: secrets of the darkest art
entities.description: Secrets of the Darkest Art is a book that Hermione drops when the bedroom door bursts open. (Excerpt: 'Hermione shrieked and dropped Secrets of the Darkest Art.')

entities.name: chocolate frog wrapper
entities.description: A Chocolate Frog wrapper is mentioned as something that Ron slips on, causing him to fall. (Excerpt: 'Ron jumped oﬀ the bed, skidded on a discarded Chocolate Frog wrapper...')

entities.name: wedding presents
entities.description: Wedding presents are mentioned as something that needs to be sorted out by Mrs Weasley. (Excerpt: 'there are wedding presents stacked in my room...')

relationships.description: Harry regrets not asking Dumbledore more questions when he was alive. (Excerpt: 'it seemed to Harry that he had wasted so many opportunities...')
Harry and Hermione are friends, as evidenced by their presence together in the bedroom. (Excerpt: 'The silence was shattered as the bedroom door ﬂew open...')
Harry and Ron are friends, as evidenced by their presence together in the bedroom. (Excerpt: 'The silence was shattered as the bedroom door ﬂew open...')
Hermione owns Crookshanks, her cat. (Excerpt: 'Crookshanks streaked under the bed...')
Mrs Weasley is responsible for sorting out wedding presents. (Excerpt: 'there are wedding presents stacked in my room...')
